@zeborah @thelittlepakeha and it really sucks.
@zeborah @thelittlepakeha obv there are jobs that legit require it, but a lot of employers think it means "adult/reliable/responsible/normal
@zeborah @thelittlepakeha when I ask they usually say "there might be a meeting across town" or "we need reliable staff". Bullshit, iow.
@ChelleHopeBlog yeah that's a fucking dubious thing to assume. People are strange.
@ChelleHopeBlog well that's fucking weird. And would creep me out. Are you ok?
Am I writing a completely unsellable experimentally-structured novella in second person? Yes, yes I think I am.
@AJFitzwater Oh! Pratchett's Tiffany Aching series. I'm not a _huge_ Pratchett fan but they are energetic, feministy, and delightful.
@AJFitzwater Urrrrrgh apart from that, I think everything on my piles is pretty heavy, gdi.
@AJFitzwater Other go to for easy reading is Rivers of London series. Not esp feministy, but also inoffensive, esp for detective story.
@AJFitzwater Highish body count, but very quick/easy reads otw. No r-pe.
@AJFitzwater I'm reading Seanan McGuire's Incryptid series - for obv reasons, but also genuinely enjoying.

@AJFitzwater @zeborah sadly I worry it might not stay so easy
@AJFitzwater @zeborah The wellington lot have had shit glue for years. Always just round labour day I need to rip a heap down.
@zeborah at one point I walked round w a paint scraper in my bag for stubborn nazi posters. I'm glad I never got arrested & had to explain
@Langford_Cat Yaaay got your rego. All good re email, we're getting there with the programme, and will just keep adding.

Solidarity with everyone fighting #NikisEviction <3
@bogiperson not denying there were more explicit forms of exclusion, I'm sure there were, but that in itself is an issue.
@bogiperson yeah, I think anything that says "women's" without specifying "cis and trans" is not going to feel safe for many trans women.
I know this is a minor problem in the scheme of things but I'm fucked off.
But because I've got friends in the US who are shit scared and yknow, speaking like they don't exist is really not helping.
Because shit like this from that page has been all over my fucking FB timeline today, and I'm fucking tired of it. And not for myself.
Like, how hard is it to say "people". Or "women and supporters" if you want to keep that focus I don't know.
Focusing on women? Fine. Acting like some of those who are among those most at risk, and fighting hardest don't exist? Not fine.
Shit like this isn't why I didn't go to the Wellington march - there were plenty of other reasons - but it sure as… https://t.co/BooE4bItZq

@ohsofeminist it's all over my feed from generally reliable people. Not completely to time served, but she'll be out this year.

@MattyAngelNZ yes, I do that sometimes!
@EmmaLindhagen please do :) I'm pretty good at finding cheap accommodation too.
@EmmaLindhagen eeeexcellent! Let me know if you want any itinerary planning help.
@EmmaLindhagen ahhhh so you are maybe coming? I thought you weren't able to.

Um the world has just turned a really weird colour?

@irihapeta @ChelleHopeBlog lol omg you're right as well!
@ChelleHopeBlog You know how when you're sixteen just your parents existing is horrifically embarrassing? YEAH.
@ChelleHopeBlog It took me YEARS to get over this. ACTUAL YEARS.
@ChelleHopeBlog ...one person was in the room?" [because he was claiming it as work expenses. Receptionist grinned & winked at me.
@ChelleHopeBlog It was valentines day. We shared a hotel room with multiple beds. On checkout he said "can you make it look like just...
@ChelleHopeBlog So. I was ~ 16. My dad was on a work trip to a university open day which I was interested in going to so he brought me along
@JCHart it feels like most people at this point tbh <3
Why is it always too much to ask that people (a) not be bigots and (b) do what they're supposed to. Ugh :(
I really hope the rest of 2017 is not like this. I am not feeling optimistic right now.
And am in a cycle of stress➡️ sleep deprivation ➡️ less able to handle the stress 🔄
I have had this barrage of horrible stuff happen to me in the past few days and I am not holding up well at all.
@ChelleHopeBlog this isn't going to go well is it :(
Every time I think today can't get more stressful, it does! Spectacularly!
@RoseLemberg Totally read that account as neurotypical birds.
@RoseLemberg <3 I'm super sorry you had to experience that.
@bogiperson I... aside from the obvious, what the fuck is with the equivalency of that info? Is Weds rubbish day and Thurs be nice day?
@ChelleHopeBlog will it include BEES?
2k done. Novel back on track at 12k. Still have only a small idea of the plot, but OH WELL.
@zeborah @thelittlepakeha @verbscape same. My first thought was "uh well. There are buses. And an airport. Not to everyone maybe, but..."
Back to Sunday afternoons cafe write-ins. Had my spinach & cheese croissant, time for 2000 words.
@Styla73 It's not a direct equation, but generally yes. To be sure I'd look on Ravelry at what others have used.
Circus themed fête, age ~8. Girls usually wore sparkly leotards & were acrobats. I was a lion tamer in top hat and… https://t.co/Dyf0uuSs3x
@faewriter Cake, Engima, 3:15 is one option.
@faewriter Booo work! Yes, I have a meeting thing that will be finished around 2:30? upper Cuba. Open to ideas/your schedule.
@faewriter ...but also should prob come into town another day this coming week, so also pretty flexible. Prob not Weds.
@faewriter haha story of my life. I will be at Inkslingers tomorrow, btw, also in town Fri, could do late afternoon...
@faewriter wasn't sure if that was actual request or random creepy background voice, but I'd been meaning to ask & seemed like good time ;)
@Styla73 I have no idea if it does specifically what you want, but Formstack might be worth looking into?
Why... why would I do that when I still have kidneys I could sell?
LinkedIn is suggesting I apply for a job with the National Party.

@sandykidd Largely autobiographical, equal parts about families and fascism.
@sandykidd <3 May I recommend Judith Kerr's "When Hitler Stole Pink Rabbit". It was my favourite book when I was Bastian's age.
.@Merc_Rustad I know everyone else is saying, but I'm also going to say it: this story was AMAZING.

@Merc_Rustad @UncannyMagazine ugh I'm sorry you had to read bullshit, but full endorse your reaction!
First story sale for 2017 \o/. Deets to come!
@ChelleHopeBlog They don't get that mine has like, absolute basics of self care on. And that I risk forgetting it exists. Etc.
@ChelleHopeBlog but people are like "yeah, to do list, I have one of those". And yeah, cool. But.
@ChelleHopeBlog 😭I find mine last a few months to a year and then I need to redo them. It's okayish, but heaps of trial and error.
@ChelleHopeBlog ...or look at them and are all "wow you're such an organised person". No. No I'm not. I'd just sort of die without this.
@ChelleHopeBlog Yeah. Different diagnosis but similar symptoms. The worst is when people convince you you don't need your systems...
Today's short fiction reading: The Three Nights of the Half-Gent https://t.co/Kf2DgpjOYk
Apparently putting a bunch of stuff off until 2nd January... means on 2nd January you have 47 items on your todo list. Fuckity fuck fuck.
Anyway I got terrible sleep and am grumpy as fuck, time for caffeine!
Also on the agenda again: heaps of @Lexicon_NZ stuff. Five months! Terrifying! + a new issue of @capricioussf to be released this month.
Back to a work schedule :/ I have a bit of paid work, then adding freelance work that sort of pays, job hunting stuff, training stuff.
Friends, this looks awesome and you should totally go support it <3 https://t.co/9jRj3aVo8L
@AJFitzwater Ah I _thought_ I'd lent it to you but assumed I must have been mistaken. Stupid brains *hugs* Worth owning & reading again imo.
Today's short fiction reading: Can’t Beat ‘Em https://t.co/58KC4GFOq0
@lethallime @OJCade It's working. FINALLY. I mean, it's not like 2017 happening was a surprise...
I have bamboo. This world is full of grasses. Saving grace.
... now I have to write this thing with no. fucking. wood. It's not easy. Not at all.
I removed (a) trees and (b) horses from this world, to force myself to not fall into faux-medieval-Western-Europe traps...
Oh what the fucking fuck I can't even log books I read in 2017??? GDI
Perpetually annoyed by how late the Goodreads challenge opens tbh.
